documentation.text: @dev Initialize using msg.sender as the first governor.

@dev Set the pending governor, which will be the governor once accepted.
 @param _pendingGovernor The address to become the pending governor.
@dev Accept to become the new governor. Must be called by the pending governor.

acceptGovernor().details: Accept to become the new governor. Must be called by the pending governor.

setPendingGovernor(address).details: Set the pending governor, which will be the governor once accepted.

params._pendingGovernor: The address to become the pending governor.
